title: Hampta Pass
subtitle: Valley-to-desert crossover
about: Hampta Pass is a dramatic crossing between the Kullu valley’s green forests and the stark high deserts of Lahaul–Spiti. The terrain changes quickly, offering river crossings, moraine sections and a striking sense of contrast.
seo_title: Hampta Pass Trek — Kullu to Lahaul Crossover
seo_description: A popular trail that shifts from lush forests to high desert plateaus—ideal for diverse alpine scenery in a short route.

trek_places.name: Jobra
trek_places.short: Entry point with generous valley views
trek_places.about: Jobra is the common trailhead where villagers host trekkers. It’s the last green staging area before the route climbs into higher exposed sections.
what_to_do: Meet guides and check river conditions

trek_places.name: Hampta Pass Summit
trek_places.short: The high saddle with wide Lahaul views
trek_places.about: The pass saddle is the dramatic turning point between two worlds—the greenery of Kullu and the arid plateaus below. It’s a high, exposed col with sweeping views and a sense of accomplishment.
what_to_do: Enjoy panoramic lunch at the col
